meanings.definition: A physician who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of kidney diseases.
meanings.sent1: The nephrologists at the hospital are experts in treating kidney problems.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a nephrologist who helps people with kidney diseases.
meanings.sent3: Why did the nephrologists bring a microscope to the kidney party? To get a closer look!
meanings.sent4: The nephrologists are like detectives, investigating the mysteries of the kidneys.
meanings.sent5: The nephrologists' dedication to kidney health is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The study of the structure, function, and diseases of the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: Learning about nephrology helps us understand how our kidneys work.
meanings.sent2: The book on nephrology covers everything from kidney functions to diseases.
meanings.sent3: The nephrology class made studying kidneys surprisingly fun and interesting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, nephrology shines a light on the complexities of the kidneys.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nephrology lies in unraveling the secrets of kidney health.
